mapper.select: SELECT c.cseq, d.dseq ,d.name dname, s.sseq, s.name subname, p.pseq, p.name pname, s.time, c.result, t.id sid FROM cart c, department d, subject s, professor p, student t WHERE c.result = '1' AND c.sseq = s.sseq AND d.dseq = s.dseq AND p.id = s.id AND t.id = c.id AND s.id =#{sid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cseq, id, pseq, quantity) VALUES(cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pseq}, #{quantity})
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET result='2' WHERE cseq=#{cseq}
